name: StealthMan
description:
Finally I was able to submit my first game completely made by myself in a jam!

It looks terrible, gameplay is very poor, easy to win.. yes! but it's my creature and a good way to start in my opinion, where I can notice there areas where I can improve.. any area basically :D

Since the theme of the jam was quality I tried to stick to a kind of game that was "simple" like pac-man, and try to improve its gameplay and visuals to achieve as much quality as possible. But at the end, I just had time to finish a basic gameplay, play a bit with a light and try to have something game-like ready to submit. 

All feedback is more than welcome!
